faq.desc: Some of the most frequently asked questions are answered below. If you have any other questions, feel free to contact us.
faq.q1: What specialties does Dr. Mohamed El-Hodaimi offer in the clinic?
faq.a1: The clinic specializes in obstetrics and gynecology, infertility treatment, IVF, gynecological endoscopy surgeries, painless natural and cesarean delivery, and addressing women’s health issues such as vaginal bleeding and uterine prolapse.
faq.q2: What services are available for pregnant women at Dr. Mohamed El-Hodaimi’s clinic?
faq.a2: The clinic provides comprehensive pregnancy care, including routine and high-risk pregnancy follow-up, 4D fetal ultrasound, nutritional consultations, and personalized birth plans tailored to each patient.
faq.q3: Does Dr. Mohamed El-Hodaimi offer treatment for infertility cases?
faq.a3: Yes, the clinic specializes in treating infertility using advanced IVF and ICSI techniques, along with precise diagnosis and customized treatment plans for each couple.
faq.q4: Are cosmetic gynecological surgeries and vaginal prolapse correction available at the clinic?
faq.a4: Yes, the clinic offers cosmetic vaginal surgeries, correction of vaginal prolapse, and urinary incontinence treatment using the latest technologies to ensure optimal results.
faq.q5: How can I book an appointment with Dr. Mohamed El-Hodaimi?
faq.a5: You can book an appointment by contacting the clinic directly or through the online booking platform, where you can select the most convenient time for your visit.

aboutus.desc: This is a short description about my self and my work.
aboutus.question: Who is Dr. Muhammad Al-Hodiby?
aboutus.name: Dr. Mohamed El-Hodiby
aboutus.overview: Senior Consultant in Obstetrics, Gynecology, IVF, and Endoscopy - PhD in Obstetrics and Gynecology - Fellow of the Fetal Medicine Unit - Kasr Al-Ainy - Consultant in Painless Natural Delivery, Painless C-Section, and 4D Fetal Ultrasound - Specialist in the treatment of vaginal bleeding, urinary incontinence, gynecological infections, and post-menopause follow-up - Pre-marital consultations - Vaginal and uterine prolapse repair - Hysterectomy and fibroid removal - Ovarian cyst removal - In vitro fertilization (IVF), intracytoplasmic sperm injection (ICSI), and infertility treatment.
